import { Card, Row, Col, CardTitle, CardBody, Button, Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, FormText, } from "reactstrap"; import { useForm } from "../hooks/useForm"; import axios from 'axios'; import { Navigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useEffect } from "react"; const baseUrl= "http://localhost:3002/api/personas/" async function postPersonas (){ try { const response = await axios({ url: `${baseUrl}`, method: "POST" }) return } catch (error) { console.log(error) } } const Starter = () => { const [values, handleInputChange, reset, setValues] = useForm(); console.log(values) useEffect(()=>{ async function loadProducts(){ const response= await postPersonas() setValues(values) return response } loadProducts() return }, []) return ( {/* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/} {/* Card-1*/} {/* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/} Publica un proyecto
); }; export default Starter;
